attributes.action: bring back death penalty in the baby P case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the people of Britain call on the government to bring back the death sentence and prosecute all those involved in the Baby P case, listen to the people you claim you listen to, there is far too much crime and we call on you to bring back capital punishment in such cases as this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
